programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Fluoride: Cheery US comedy that pokes fun at local government lunacy. Leslie battles absurd rumours about Pawnee's water supply. Communists use fluoride to control our minds! S6 Ep8

programme.title: The Indestructibles
programme.desc: Bouncing Bombs: Dave's very own high-octane series sees Tim Warwood and Adam Gendle dream up epic stunts. Tim and Gendle try to bounce a man across a lake and into a target! S1 Ep1

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Sin City Motors
programme.desc: Bitchin' Rod: Corking custom car builds. Steve and pal Kyle kit out a Model A for Steve's younger brother Dusty. But will Steve want to part with this rocking rat rod when they've finished? S1 Ep8

programme.title: Cops UK: Bodycam Squad
programme.desc: Documentary series following Britain's most cutting-edge police forces. Nottinghamshire Police deal with a potential inferno after the inside of a house is doused in petrol. S3 Ep1

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull...
programme.desc: ...Challenge. Locked and Loaded: An octet of hard-as-nails blokes take up Steve Austin's punishing challenge - but only one tough guy will get the chance to win $10,000. S1 Ep5

programme.title: Sin City Motors
programme.desc: Wagon Rod: Master fabricator Steve Darnell is back to kit out one-of-a-kind custom cars! A Chevy Station Wagon gets a modern makeover on the inside and a rat rod exterior. S2 Ep1

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Formula 1 star Lewis Hamilton joins Jeremy Clarkson and his fellow petrolheads for the motoring show that packs a real punch. Vauxhall's VXR8 gets a spin on the test track. S10 Ep8

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Men and motors - automotive antics with Clarkson and the team. Jeremy and James May show off the ageing but massive luxury cars they bought for the price of a new Ford Mondeo. S11 Ep5

programme.title: MegaTruckers
programme.desc: Keep on truckin'! Young Ryan hauls a digger to Darwin - can he fit in a family reunion with his trucker dad? Control freak Dave isn't best pleased to see boss Jon at a $2m job. S1 Ep5

programme.title: MegaTruckers
programme.desc: Reality TV goes on the road in this Aussie series. Fortunes could be made and lost as Jon takes on a risky operation from a rival - and there's a $97m contract up for grabs. S1 Ep6

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Kiss and Sell: Busts of rock group KISS, art deco cigarette machines, old traffic signals - another eclectic haul for the salvage supremos in the ever-watchable US reality show. S6 Ep14

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: More motoring mischief. Jeremy Clarkson tries to outrun Japan's legendary 'bullet train' in the remarkable Nissan GT-R. Newscasters Fiona Bruce and Kate Silverton guest. S11 Ep4

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: California Gold Mine: The chipper show where two collectors turn America's trash into handy cash. Mike and Frank hit the jackpot after following up a lead on a vintage steam car. S5 Ep13

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Risks and Rewards: In Detroit, Frank takes a big risk. Meanwhile, Mike acquires a Purple Heart. S11 Ep13

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Beetle in a Haystack: A lead on a rare VW Beetle turns out to be true, but it will take some seriously heavy metal to shift it from its rustic home. S9 Ep5

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Keys: The ever-witty fact-packed quiz show. Stephen Fry grills Isy Suttie, Tim Minchin, Bill Bailey and Alan Davies on all things key-related, from pianos to the QWERTY keyboard. S11 Ep8

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Current affairs with a comedic slant. Dara O Briain and the regulars are joined by guests Greg Davies, Gary Delaney and Jo Caulfield to poke fun at the great and good. S11 Ep9

programme.desc: Second Chunce: The 100th episode of the superlative US comedy, just as funny as the first. Leslie has a fresh shot at running for city council, just as her term is ending. S6 Ep10

programme.title: Red Dwarf XII

programme.title: QI

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Madagascar: Extreme wildlife show. Steve Backshall encounters gremlin-like aye-ayes and Madagascar's most ferocious carnivore as he searches the island for Deadly 60 contenders. S2 Ep11

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Uganda: Extreme animal encounters. Steve is in Uganda, getting up close and personal with gorillas in the mountains, squabbling baboons on the savannah and chimps in the forest. S2 Ep12

programme.desc: Catherine Tate, Rylan Clark-Neal and Nigel Havers reveal to Frank Skinner their pet peeves, including hipster restaurants, set-up paparazzi shoots - and Jeremy Corbyn. S6 Ep1
